snippet: Dan Barry narrates over a gallery of images and artifacts from the time when newsboys — the town criers of the cities, street-hardened ragamuffins — captured the country’s imagination.
lead_paragraph: Dan Barry narrates over a gallery of images and artifacts from the time when newsboys — the town criers of the cities, street-hardened ragamuffins — captured the country’s imagination.

headline.main: The Kids Who Shouted the News
